name: Peter Buneman
content: Homepage Peter Buneman LFCS, School of Informatics Crichton Street Edinburgh EH8 9LE Tel: +44 131 650 5133 Fax: +44 131 651 3815 Email: I work in the Database Group in the Laboratory for Foundations of Computer Science. I am also involved with the Digital Curation Centre. Here is a CV and a list of publications (including links to scans of old papers on mathematical phylogeny) I'm not easy to find, but some clever people at CMU have figured out how to find me in polynomial time. I can also be found somewhere near here doing things like this with people like this Before coming to Edinburgh, I spent many happy years in the Database Group of the Department of Computer and Information Science at the University of Pennsylania Here is a scan of a higly cited but hard to find technical report by my father: Oscar Buneman. A compact non-iterative poisson-solver. SUIPR report 294, Stanford University (1969).
